cleanteamghana 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Ghana Clean Team Survey

    cleanteamghana.Rd

    The Clean Team Ghana dataset captures extensive information on various aspects of container-based sanitation in Ghana. It includes data on household demographics, sanitation facilities, cleanliness perceptions, usage patterns, satisfaction levels, concerns, and factors influencing the adoption of Clean Team Ghana's container-based sanitation services. This dataset aims to evaluate the effectiveness, acceptance, and challenges associated with container-based sanitation practices in Ghanaian communities.

    Usage

    cleanteamghana

    Format

    A tibble with 583 rows and 127 variables:

    uuid

    Unique identifier for each record

    submission_time

    Timestamp of the survey submission

    area

    Area of the observation

    district

    District of the observation

    community

    Community of the observation

    cleanliness_of_neighborhood

    Perceived cleanliness of the neighborhood

    safety_of_neighborhood

    Perceived safety of the neighborhood

    development_priority_of_neighborhood

    Development priority of the neighborhood

    age_of_respondent

    Age of the respondent

    sex_respondent

    Gender of the respondent

    marital_status

    Marital status of the respondent

    highest_level_of_education

    Highest level of education completed by the respondent

    employment_type

    Type of employment of the respondent

    house_ownership

    Ownership status of the house

    landlord_residence

    Whether the landlord resides in the same location

    female_less_5

    Number of females under 5 years old living in the house

    female_from_5_to_18

    Number of females between 5 and 18 years old living in the house

    female_more_18

    Number of females over 18 years old living in the house

    male_less_5

    Number of males under 5 years old living in the house

    male_from_5_to_18

    Number of males between 5 and 18 years old living in the house

    male_more_18

    Number of males over 18 years old living in the house

    number_households_sharing

    Number of households sharing a facility

    number_of_households

    Total number of households in the house/area?

    number_of_rooms

    Total number of rooms in the house

    daily_toilet_usage

    Frequency of toilet usage per day

    electricity_situation

    Electricity situation in the house

    fuel_used_for_cooking

    Type of fuel used for cooking

    location_of_water_source

    Location of water source

    able_to_observe_toilet

    Ability to observe a toilet in the area by the interviewer

    cant_afford_toilet

    Inability to afford a toilet by inhabitants of the house

    functioning_toilet

    Presence of a functioning toilet

    functioning_toilet_is_ctg

    The functioning toilet is from Clean Team Ghana?

    handwashing_facility

    Availability of a handwashing facility

    floor_material

    Material used for flooring

    roof_material

    Material used for roofing

    wall_material

    Material used for walls

    pan_material

    Material used for toilet pans

    pit_lining

    Presence of pit lining

    mechanical_emptying

    Mechanical emptying of the pit

    primary_solidwaste_collection

    Primary method of solid waste collection

    presence_of_drain

    Presence of a drain in the toilet

    presence_of_paved_road

    Presence of paved roads near the toilet

    presence_of_street_lights

    Presence of street lights near the toilet

    cleaned_toilet

    Cleanliness of the toilel

    cleanliness_of_pan

    Cleanliness of the toilet pan

    cleanliness_of_slab

    Cleanliness of the toilet slab

    concerns_about_using_ctg_toilet

    Whether individuals have concerns about using the Clean Team Ghana (CTG) toilet

    concerns_about_using_ctg_toilet_specify

    Respondents can specify their concerns about using the CTG toilet if they have any

    container_replaced_freq_ctg

    Frequency of container replacement for the CTG toilet

    cost_per_use

    Cost incurred per use of the CTG toilet

    ctg_cleanliness

    Perceived cleanliness of the CTG toilet

    ctg_information_source

    Source from which individuals obtained information about the CTG toilet

    ctg_issues

    Any issues or problems related to the CTG toilet

    ctg_recommendation

    Whether individuals would recommend the CTG toilet to others

    door_lockable_inside

    Whether the CTG toilet has a lockable door from the inside

    door_lockable_outside

    Whether the CTG toilet has a lockable door from the outside

    ever_unable_to_use_ctg

    Whether individuals have ever been unable to use the CTG toilet

    ever_unable_to_use_ctg_specify

    Respondents can specify reasons if they have ever been unable to use the CTG toilet

    fear_of_being_removed

    Whether individuals fear the CTG toilet of being removed

    how_likely_to_recommend_clean_team

    Likelihood of individuals recommending Clean Team Ghana's services to others

    is_ctg_available

    Availability of the CTG toilet in this particular area

    knowledge_of_toilet_sharing

    Individuals' awareness or understanding of sharing toilets among multiple users

    management_of_children_feces

    Need for managing children's feces

    odour_control_agents_baseline

    Agents or methods used for controlling odors at the baseline or initial stage

    odour_control_agents_endline

    Agents or methods used for controlling odors at the endpoint or final stage

    odour_control_baseline

    Effectiveness or measures taken to control odors at the baseline or initial stage

    odour_control_endline

    Effectiveness or measures taken to control odors at the endpoint or final stage

    people_using_ctg

    Number of people using Clean Team Ghana's services or toilets in this particular area

    rent_paid

    Amount of rent paid by CTG?

    sanqol_assault

    Perceptions or experiences related to assault or safety concerns at the sanitation facility

    sanqol_cleanliness

    Perceptions or evaluations of the cleanliness of the sanitation facility.

    sanqol_convenience

    Level of convenience provided by the sanitation facility

    sanqol_cost

    Perceptions or satisfaction related to the cost of using the sanitation facility

    sanqol_disgust

    Feelings of disgust or repulsion associated with the sanitation facility

    sanqol_health

    Perceptions or concerns about health-related aspects associated with the sanitation facility

    sanqol_privacy

    Perceptions or satisfaction levels regarding privacy at the sanitation facility

    sanqol_proud

    Feelings of pride or satisfaction associated with using the sanitation facility

    sanqol_safety

    Perceptions or feelings of safety related to the sanitation facility

    sanqol_shame

    Feelings of shame associated with using the sanitation facility

    sanqol_smell

    Perceptions or experiences related to unpleasant smells at the sanitation facility

    satisfaction_avoiding_unpleasant_odour

    Satisfaction levels regarding avoiding unpleasant odors while using the facility

    satisfaction_avoiding_unpleasant_odour_not_in_use

    Satisfaction levels regarding avoiding unpleasant odors when the facility is not in use

    satisfaction_combine_duities_and_using_toilet

    Satisfaction levels while combining duties and using the toilet

    satisfaction_manage_menstrual_hygiene

    Satisfaction levels regarding the management of menstrual hygiene at the facility

    satisfaction_towards_cost_of_latrine_usage

    Satisfaction levels related to the cost of using the latrine or sanitation facility

    satisfaction_towards_ease_to_access

    Satisfaction levels related to the ease of access to the sanitation facility

    satisfaction_towards_ease_to_use

    Satisfaction levels related to the ease of using the sanitation facility

    satisfaction_towards_privacy_of_toilet_use

    Satisfaction levels related to the privacy offered during toilet use

    satisfaction_towards_toilet_cleanliness

    Satisfaction levels related to the cleanliness of the toilet

    satisfaction_towards_toilet_uncomfortabity

    Discomfort experienced while using the toilet

    sharing_of_toilet_baseline

    Sharing pattern or practices related to using the toilet at the baseline or initial stage

    sharing_of_toilet_endline

    Sharing pattern or practices related to using the toilet at the endpoint or final stage

    slab_material

    Material used for constructing the slab of the sanitation facility

    slab_material_other

    Additional information on the material used for constructing the slab if it's specified as 'other'

    smell_reduction_system

    Method implemented within the toilet facility to reduce or eliminate unpleasant odors

    soap_for_handwashing

    Availability of soap provided specifically for handwashing within the toilet facility

    source_of_water_for_drinking

    Available water source within the toilet facility intended for drinking purposes

    source_of_water_for_other_purposes

    Water source within the toilet facility used for non-drinking purposes such as cleaning, flushing, or other sanitary needs

    time_to_access_toilet

    Time taken to reach the toilet from a specific point, likely measured in minutes.

    time_to_get_water

    Time required to access water, likely measured in minutes

    toilet_door

    Presence of toilet door in the toilet facility

    toilet_location_baseline

    Initial or baseline location of the toilet facility

    toilet_location_ctg

    Location of the Clean Team Ghana toilet facility

    toilet_on_compound_cant_use

    Presence of a toilet within a compound that is unusable for some reason

    toilet_public_usage_baseline

    Usage pattern or availability of the toilet facility at the baseline

    toilet_public_usage_endline

    Usage pattern or availability of the toilet facility at the endpoint or final stage

    toilet_roof

    Presence of toilet roof in the toilet facility

    toilet_scrubbedmopped_frequency

    Frequency of cleaning activities like scrubbing and mopping of the toilet

    toilet_use_payment_option

    Payment for using the toilet

    toilet_walls

    Presence of toilet wall in the toilet facility

    type_of_toilet

    Type of toilet facility (e.g., pit latrine, flush toilet)

    urinate_or_defecate_at_night

    Behavior related to urination or defecation during the night

    urinate_or_defecate_at_night_use_ctg

    Nighttime urination or defecation patterns in the Clean Team Ghana toilet

    use_non_ctg_toilet

    Usage of a non-Clean Team Ghana provided toilet facility

    wait_for_replacement_ctg

    If the residents waiting for a replacement of the Clean Team Ghana toilet

    water_for_handwashing

    Availability of water for handwashing

    why_not_observed

    Reasons why CTG toilet wasn't observed

    why_not_use_a_toilet

    Reasons for not using a toilet in general

    why_not_use_household_toilets

    Reasons for not using a household toilet

    why_not_use_household_toilets_other

    Additional reasons for not using household toilets if specified as 'other'

    years_living_in_current_house

    Duration of time spent living in the current household

    household_size

    Total number of individuals living in a household

    adults

    Count of adults in the household

    kids

    Count of kids in the household

    sanqol_rawindex

    Raw numerical index representing the overall satisfaction in sanitation quality of life

    sanqol_rawscore

    Raw numerical score representing the overall satisfaction in sanitation quality of life

    cost_per_month_public_baseline

    Cost per month related to public toilet usage at the baseline stage
